description.ruby-sapphire:
Charges power to boost the
electric move used next.
description.emerald:
Charges power to boost the
electric move used next.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user charges
power to boost the
ELECTRIC move it
uses next.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user boosts the
power of the Electric
move it uses next.
It also raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

The user boosts the
power of the Electric
move it uses next.
It also raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

effect.full: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
effect.shortEffect: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  User's Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
